name: Provoke <icon>skill_icons 0, 34</>
desc: Enemies will have higher chance to target unit when unit is above 75% Max HP. Gain a stack of <red>Counter Point</> (<icon>skill_icons 15, 36</>) each time unit is damaged in combat. (x1.2 bonus damage for each stack, +2 DEF/RES. Max 5 stacks. Lost on turn.)
